about_the_game:
Ghost Stories of Bangladesh is an atmospheric, first-person, horror game series based on the ghost stories of Bangladesh.

Come Home


Young Saif always loved going for walks with his dad in the forest near his home in Sylhet, Bangladesh. One day, everything changed when they became separated and Saif was left alone and frightened. What he encountered that day would impact the course of his life and reveal secrets about his home that, sooner or later, would need to be confronted.

Gameplay


First person, narrative driven with occasional, gentle, problem solving. Opportunities to take different paths which result in a different outcome to the story.

Features


Piece together your own story from the clues you discover.

Based on real ghost stories from Bangladesh.
